function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of temperature control in individual rooms","Impact":"Uneven heating and potential for temperature deviations favoring disease propagation","Mitigation":"Implement smart temperature control systems for individual rooms","Technologies":"Smart thermostats, zoning systems","People":"Building occupants, visitors","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Insufficient coverage of relevant heating loads by meters","Impact":"Inaccurate monitoring and assessment of heating demand, leading to inefficient energy use","Mitigation":"Install additional meters to cover at least 90% of the relevant heating loads","Technologies":"Advanced energy meters, thermal imaging sensors","People":"Building technical managers, energy efficiency consultants","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Lack of domestic hot water storage and control","Impact":"Risk of inadequate hot water supply and potential for microbial growth due to inconsistent temperature control","Mitigation":"Install domestic hot water storage systems with temperature control mechanisms","Technologies":"Hot water storage tanks, temperature sensors, water circulation controls","People":"Building occupants, maintenance staff","Owner":"Building management"}]}
